Reviews.Title: T3, NOT a T3i.
Reviews.Author: TravelNut101
Reviews.Content: This is to let people know that may be unfamiliar with the Canon line that this is NOT the more modern T3i (600D), but a much older T3.  It does not have the capabilities, image size or cost of the T3i.  Be sure to compare apples to apples when looking at this. There really isn't anything wrong with the camera, just be aware of what you are buying.
